attributes.action: build new railway lines for Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Northern Ireland is a poorly linked network of poor networks.
 The lines i feel that are most need are links with Belfast international airport as their are no good transport links to/from the airport.The Mid-ulster area lacks a transportation link with the main towns (Cookstown, Magherafelt and Maghera). This was listed in a consolation but no process has ever been made.
 Finally it has been noted in a number of newspappers have said that the airport and the economy is losing out due to the lack of airport links.
 make some expansion to the network but mostly in the areas listed above that is all i ask from the government.
